Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that President Obama stopped wearing his wedding ring and wristwatch in observance of the Islamic holy month of Ramadan.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that President Obama actually stopped wearing his wedding ring and wristwatch during Ramadan.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there are photographs from the period of Ramadan in 2011 showing President Obama wearing both his wedding ring and watch.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for why President Obama may not have been wearing his wedding ring or wristwatch during certain occasions.
